page.title: 19HOBBIES AND PETS
page.content: My favourite hobby is Fantasy.Fantasy is a mixture of space and Middle Earth.Middle Earth is about swords goblins and heroes.I like {reading}and {drawing} as well. I live in Accrington and go to {Peel {Park School.}I travel to school by bus but I walk home. I have got a pet cat called Bouncer who is always eating,sleeping and biting.He is fat,fluffy and makes the ground shake when he walks or should I say plods along.My grandma has a cat as well but it is completely different from my cat. It is called Timmy. The sports I like are football and cricket. Edward Foster.
